title: UAE residents could get 4-day holiday for Eid Al Fitr, here's how
summary_full: Ramadan has begun in the UAE, with anticipation building for Eid Al Fitr. The exact length of the public holiday, potentially four days, hinges on the crescent moon sighting on March 18. Whether Ramadan lasts 29 or 30 days, a long weekend is expected, with official dates subject to confirmation.
